name: 盧宗成
objective: This class discusses the subject of logistics management, which is an area of management that can be essential to a firm’s competitive strategy and revenue generation. The business activities of concern may include all or part of the following: transportation, inventory maintenance, order processing, purchasing, warehousing, materials handling, packaging, customer service, and production. The focus is on the planning, organizing, and controlling of these activities – key elements for successful management in any organization.
